title: ‘Three Grand Tours and No Monument – It’s like Something’s Missing’: Wout van Aert Under Spotlight in Must-Win Spring
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike backs high risk-high reward strategy for Van Aert in his approach to the cobblestone classics.

Read the full article at ‘Three Grand Tours and No Monument – It’s like Something’s Missing’: Wout van Aert Under Spotlight in Must-Win Spring on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
